overview: Fatih is the one who learned the pain of fate in childhood. A struggle to save her mother from her stepfather's death killed her step-father. Fatih, who is found guilty, is placed in penitentiary at a young age. However, Fatih grows up and succeeds himself. The love of childhood goes into the life of the young man, and he is even more happy. But hidden crimes will not be hidden forever.
title: Makas
